Key Match Events: LeBron James and Anthony Davis combined for 63 points, 23 rebounds and 12 assists to lead their team to victory
DeMar DeRozan and De'Aaron Fox tallied 51 points, 13 assists and five rebounds together
The Lakers surged to a 14-6 lead midway through the first quarter
The Lakers had another strong burst to open the second quarter, dropping a 14-1 run in the first four minutes for a 42-27 lead
Sacramento responded with a series of mini runs to crawl within 125-123 of the Lakers with 55.1 left in the game
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Lakers, playing on short rest, survived a thrilling battle against the Sacramento Kings on Saturday to emerge with a 131-127 win
Others: Domantas Sabonis had 29 points, 12 rebounds, 10 assists, one block and one steal
The Kings looked like they were going to be blown away early in the fourth quarter but kept fighting
The Lakers are now 3-0 while the Kings dropped to 0-2 following Saturday's game
